subject: AM Brief: Wed, 31 May 2023
body:
Good morning,

**Overnight Market Summary:**
The tone was risk-off. Base metals were volatile amid concerns over CFA Franc BEAC.

**Key Event Today:** FOMC Minutes at 12:00 AEST.

**Key Reads for Today:**
- JPM Research: Jenkins - Oberbrunner downgraded to Neutral
- Bloomberg: Denuo desino pax causa sophismata summopere aurum aegre.
- AFR: Tutamen creo terebro libero spero carmen.

--
J.P. Morgan Research
This is an automated daily briefing.
For more information, please contact your representative.

subject: Building Update: Scheduled Fire Drill
body:
Dear Occupants,

A scheduled fire drill will be conducted this Monday morning between 10:00 AM - 11:00 AM. All building employees must participate.

Please follow instructions from your floor wardens. If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to reach out.

Kind regards,
Nathan Wright

--
Nathan Wright
Building Manager
101 Collins Street Management
Level 31, 101 Collins Street, Melbourne VIC 3000
Tel: +61 3 8636 5000

subject: Important: Air Conditioning Maintenance Tonight
body:
Please be advised that essential maintenance will be performed on the building's air conditioning system after 7:00 PM tonight. Some noise disruption may occur.

We appreciate your patience and apologise for any inconvenience caused.

Regards,
Nathan Wright

--
Nathan Wright
Building Manager
101 Collins Street Management
Level 31, 101 Collins Street, Melbourne VIC 3000
Tel: +61 3 8636 5000

subject: URGENT: Portfolio Adjustment for Club Plus
body:
Tom,

Client instruction just came down. We need to immediately reduce the USD exposure.

Please drop everything and model out the implications. I need execution levels and a full impact analysis on my desk in 2 hours.

Sarah Connor

--
Sarah Connor
Managing Director, Portfolio Manager
J.P. Morgan Asset Management
Sydney, Australia
Tel: +61 2 9003 8888
